global.title: respondeco
global.browsehappy: You are using an outdated browser. Please upgrade your browser to improve your experience.

tooltip.not-changeable: This setting can not be changed anymore. If you want to change this setting please contact our support (support@respondeco.org).
tooltip.not-changeable-init: This setting can not be changed anymore.
tooltip.not-changeable-email: The E-Mail of the organization has been defined in the registration. If you want to change this setting please contact our support (support@respondeco.org).

info.authenticated:
If you want to authenticate, you can try the default accounts:
- Administrator (login="admin" and password="admin")
- User (login="user" and password="user").

error.dontmatch: The password and its confirmation do not match!

newpassword.minlength: Your password is required to be at least 5 characters
newpassword.maxlength: Your password cannot be longer than 50 characters

confirmpassword.maxlength: Your confirmation password cannot be longer than 50 characters

email.minlength: Your e-mail is required to be at least 5 characters
email.maxlength: Your e-mail cannot be longer than 50 characters

name.minlength: The name of your organization has to be at least 3 letters long
name.maxlength: The name of your organization can only have 255 letters at max

description.maxlength: Your description can only have 2048 letters at max

posting.minlength: Your posting has to be at least 5 letters long
posting.maxlength: Your posting can only have 2048 letters at max

content.minlength: The content has to be at least 1 letter long.

error.server.unreachable: The server could not be reached.

success.title: Success
